Based on the user's preference cues, I would recommend "End of Watch" to them.
End of Watch is a 2016 American crime thriller film directed by David Ayer and starring Jake Gyllenhaal and Frank Grillo.
The plot follows two police officers in Los Angeles who are partners and friends. They are called out on a routine call, only to discover that they are in the wrong jurisdiction and must now make their way back through hostile territory, all while still being partners and friends.
End of Watch has received positive reviews from critics for its direction, acting, and screenplay. It has also earned commercial success with over $30 million worldwide.

Based on the user's preference cues, I would recommend "Man on Wire" to them.
Man on Wire is a 2008 American crime thriller film directed by David Ayer and starring Jean-Louis Blondeau, Paul McGill, Philippe Petit.
The plot follows the life of Philippe Petit, a tightrope walker who performed high-wire routines between New York City's World Trade Center' s twin towers in 1974. In 2008, Ayer directed a sequel to the original film entitled Man on Wire, which also stars Jean-Louis Blondeau, Paul McGill, Philippe Petit.
